thread.title: Oil giants pledge support for climate deal
thread.title_full: Oil giants pledge support for climate deal

author: news.com.au
title: Oil giants pledge support for climate deal
text:
THE chief executives of 10 of the world's biggest oil and gas companies have pledged support for an "effective" deal to fight global warming at a Paris conference next month.
IN a statement on Friday, the CEOs of BP, Shell, Saudi Aramco, Total, Repsol, Statoil, Eni, Petroelos Mexicanos, Reliance Industries and BG Group said they recognise greenhouse gas emissions trends are inconsistent with the ambition to keep warming below a level many consider dangerous.
 Oil giants pledge support for climate deal
